author: {'steamid': '76561198028575366', 'num_games_owned': 373, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 379, 'last_played': 1404731974}
review:
"Back to the past!" 9/10

This game could not be more appropriately titled. Rampage you say? You're damn right it is and I couldn't be more happy about it. To picture it, imagine a mashup of your favorite 8-bit video games from the 80's with some early 'Grand Theft Auto' thrown in for good measure. Which is totally awesome if you ask me, and makes for one of the best retro gaming experiences of all time; in my opinion, of course.

Playing through this game, you're sure to pick up on various themes and obvious and also obscure references to old Nintendo classics such as levels taken directly from Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (that damn water level, for instance), sounds from the Mega Man series, and the track design from one of the best racing games of all time: Rad Racer, to name a few. The plot is also a mash-up of sorts as it's basically taken directly from 'Back to the Future' with sprinkles of 'Ghostbusters' and other popular 80's movies as well. Can you imagine, both 'Ghostbusters' and 'Back to the Future' in the same game? It doesn't get much better than that, folks. 

Actually, now that I think more about it, this game is just one big barrage of nonstop old-school references to video games and movies from the 80's. But as I said, there's nothing wrong with a little nostalgia. And if you grew up playing games like 'Link to the Past', 'Mario Bros', or any of those fantastic early NES titles, then this game will make you feel like a kid again; in a good way. You know, like having no responsibilities other than to wipe your own butt after using the bathroom, or brushing your teeth before bed, or doing your homework the night before, or...hell, just pick this game up already. You will not be disappointed. And even if you are, what did you expect from a kid?

author: {'steamid': '76561198056106660', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 561, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 561, 'last_played': 1404913366}
review:
如果你是喜歡早期電動玩具風格的玩家、或是對魂斗羅CONTRA、洛克人Megaman等眾多有強烈回憶的玩家，這款遊戲不會讓你失望。玩下去往往就黏在椅子上不想起身。尤其充滿惡搞的遊戲方式，更令人回味無窮

遊戲是類似GTA的遊戲風格，你可以變換髮型、刺青等等 全部都在對話框的圖片顯示(XDD)
劇情方面就請別太在意 跳TONE的實在誇張 但不失遊玩的樂趣
玩起來算是大呼過癮的小品

缺點是 正統的遊戲時間過短  除了遊戲的城市外 沒有其他大地圖可以去 遊戲好玩之餘 重複性質太高會讓人失去重複遊戲的衝動
最後最有趣的是 玩家玩一玩會有種回到80 90年代玩遊戲的感觸讀取的視窗標題還可以看到WINDOWS的早期之作 win32
以復古為主題 你可以在OPTION選擇你所想要的顯示畫面 (包含APPLE II的黑底綠字 早期DOS遊戲的32原色 或是掌上黑白機的對比單色調

如果是對以上有興趣的玩家  來回味一下往日的情懷  本遊戲是不錯的選擇

It's worth 10 bucks to waste. It throws you references to everything - intro is full of batman, ninja turtles, mega man references.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041348104', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 447, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 447, 'last_played': 1404008880}
review:
Really fun game!

The game is a parody of many others such as GTA, Metal Gear Solid, Sonic, and much more!  It's packed with references to other games and even game development.  The story is basically Back to the Future (and I'm sure it recognizes that) and a big scavenger hunt.  You do all of these missions for the Doc to help repair the time machine.  The first half of the game is just running around having fun.  Once you get to the second half though, it's no more fun and games.  The difficulty curve shoots up and the levels will take you a few tries (or a lot).  It became a trial and error type game, kind of like Hotline Miami.  

The game is definitely worth a buy!  8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198051316829', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 107, 'last_played': 1410180276}

author: {'steamid': '76561198023821735', 'num_games_owned': 778, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 476, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 351, 'last_played': 1469054946}
review:
Retro City Rampage is fantastic. The gameplay is simple and addictive, with high replay value.
The game is nearly 100% a reference/parody of the 80's (including Back to the Future, Ghostbusters and TMNT) or popular NES games at any time (including Mario, Mega Man, and Rad Racer). It's very charming and doesn't take itself too seriously.
One of the coolest features is the graphical options. You can change your "television" to several different sets, including an arcade cabinet or a Gameboy. You can also change the color settings to look like an NES, Super NES, Sega Genesis, Atari 2600, Gameboy, and many more. You can even turn on scan-lines for an authentic 80's CRT TV experience.
My only gripes with this game are particular levels. The underwater levels are overly difficult and frustrating.
Another level pits you against several rocket launcher-wielding goons with little to fight back with; defeating them is pure dumb luck.
The final boss fight is initially interesting and stylish, but quickly becomes overly difficult and unfair. 
Other than these few issues, the game is incredibly fun and I would reccomend it to anyone.
8/10

review:
Excerpt from PRO GAMEZ 64, Jul/Aug '88:

DEZ: I like my games to have a high ChallengeFactor, but basing it on shit controls won't do.  MISS!

BAZ: This game got loads a bits from them films I seen down the cinny.  HIT!

MOZ: Honestly, there are far better softs to get for your micro.  MISS!

JIZ: Don't bother solving this tape, write over it with Adam Ant songs off the radio.  MISS!

BOTTOM LINE: Give Retro City Rampage a MISS!

PRO TIP: To make things happen, press buttons on the controller.

author: {'steamid': '76561198118114795', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 161, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 161, 'last_played': 1402638140}
review:
This is one of the best indie games I have ever played, period.

The control is tight, the graphics are serviceable (and changeable to your tastes!), the challenge is actually challenging and the chiptune music is brilliant. RCR doesn't take itself seriously in the story department but the gameplay is no joke. A lot of effort was put into this project. The main campaign is short, but it's fun to go back and raise 8-bit hell every now and then.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045873938', 'num_games_owned': 222, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 405, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 330, 'last_played': 1596247244}
review:
Excelente jogo para quem curtiu o final dos anos 80 e começo dos 90.
O jogo é repleto de referencias a jogos e filmes famosos fazendo com que você viaje no tempo se divertindo.
Se você curtiu os 2 jogos iniciais da série GTA com certeza vai se divertir muito com este jogo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031289824', 'num_games_owned': 211, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 246, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 226, 'last_played': 1403573047}
review:
While this game seems fun enough what lies beanith is a game filled with problems.

At first I was thrilled with the world and it's characters, the game doesn't even remotely take itself seriously.  With nods to practically every game and movie out there it seemed flowing with jokes, the colorful city reminded my of the original GTA.

But one I got down to actually playing I was sorely dissapointed.  The combat is basically win or die, with no health upgrades or body armor in the game you basically can only take a few hits before you die, and you will die a LOT!  Your character can't even swim!

The aiming system with the guns...confuses me to say the least, I really don't get the lock-on system.  The game features like, 10 melee weapons...all of which do as much damage as your first does, with the exception of the sword, and except for dying you can't get rid of a weapon you don't want.

As for the wanted system, it more or less works like GTA, and for a game that is supposed to be about rampaging it fills fast enough.  But it also sometimes fills for no reason at all, I was literally just sitting outside my house cycling through my melee weapons and the wanted system went to full red, a glitch I would assume...if it didn't happen again and again.

I could go on and on, but basically they tried to make a nice little shoot-em up game with nods to every "oldie" game and movie, which by itself is a nice concept, but as an actual game this one blows...hard.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012760338', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 1256, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 411, 'last_played': 1408213812}
review:
Retro City Rampage, откровенно говоря, не хватает звезд с неба и не претендует на многомиллионные сборы, но и в тени не останется. Бывалый геймер встретит в игре до боли знакомые пиксельные лица, так часто мелькавшие в 80-е и 90-e на кинескопах телевизоров. А таких знакомых там действительно хватает. Местами у вас будет создаваться ощущение беспомощности перед игрой. К чему я это? RCR трогает за больное, пинает в незащищенное, давит на главное - на воспоминания об атмосфере ушедших лет.Черепашки-ниндзя выпрыгивают из канализационного люка, неожиданно появляется Солид Снейк со своей знаменитой коробкой.Вы прокатитесь на машине времени седовласого ученого. А помните злого профессора со скверным характером и пышными усами из Sonic? Вас он тоже помнит и непременно заглянет.
Конечно, были перечислены всего лишь нескольких персонажей города Вороград (Theftopolis), на улицах которого вам и предстоит развлекаться несколько добрых вечеров.
Совершенно забыл упомянуть имя главного персонажа, в шкуре которого нам доведется многое пережить. Разработчики не стали особо заморачиваться, обозвав его просто - Игрок.
Лениво передвигаясь по бандитским улицам города, он замечает странное объявление, в котором говорится, что проходит набор помощников для работы, полной путешествий, больших денежных вознаграждений, с предоставлением страховки и собственного сотового телефона. Игрок отвечает на объявление и попадает в банду «Шута»- криминального авторитета с замашками психопата. По истечению нескольких лет наш «герой» выполнял уже особые поручения. В ходе выполнения одного из таких поручений и закручивается основной сюжет, который я не стану раскрывать вам полностью. Сохраним интригу.
Оценка 9 из 10. Рекомендую!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198023261639', 'num_games_owned': 724, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 1477, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1449, 'last_played': 1501465735}
review:
<3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3

PLUSY:
Strona audio-wizualna
Fabuła
Wyzwania
Nawiązania (i ich ilość)
Humor
Otwartość świata
Liczba możliwości
Wsparcie pada
Mody zmieniające (tylko) wygląd gry

MINUSY:
Toporność i trudność niektórych misji i wyzwań
Brak multi ani nawet co-op
Długość wątku fabularnego (zbyt krótki)
Nuda po ukończeniu kampanii i wyzwań :(


UWAGA!
W grze występuje pełno nawiązań do lat 80 i 90. Brak ich znajomości może zrujnować przyjemność z gry. Przed dokonaniem zakupu przemyśl decyzje kilka razy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058342664', 'num_games_owned': 753, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 573, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 230, 'last_played': 1415769491}
review:
ノリノリ8BITクライムアクション。
おまえ何メートル飛ぶんだよ的なジャンプとかディフォルメされた2Dならではの要素とオープンワールドが見事に合体していて、キャラを動かしててすごくワクワクする感じ。
アクティビティやミニゲーム、髪型なども豊富な上にパロディーやオマージュ、コラボ要素も多数。
キャラがちっちゃくてなにやってるかわかりづらいのぐらいが難点で、操作感もよくとにかく楽しい。
これだけのゲームをローカライズ含め殆ど独力で作ったというから恐ろしい。
BGMも最高、とにかくおすすめ。

author: {'steamid': '76561198110808518', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 366, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 339, 'last_played': 1404511985}
review: This game is not just GTA in 8 bits. It's also a whole lot of pop-culture and videogame culture references from the 80s and 90s, very catchy chiptune music, a quite funny story and a gameplay similar to the first GTA games. Simple but fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994593631', 'num_games_owned': 236, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 752, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 351, 'last_played': 1403778007}
review: Игра является одной большой пародией. Причем берет она количеством пародий, а не качеством. Тут масса отсылок к играм/фильмам, скрытых локаций, пародирующих различные инди игры, и куча знакомых персонажей. Как вымышленных так и совершенно реальных. Как например Джон Ромеро дающий нам секретный код. Город не очень большой и это даже хорошо. Заданий масса как сюжетных так и побочных на примере гта, убей столько-то людей/машин за столько-то времени таким-то и таким-то оружием. В любом случае игра веселая и не требующая много времени. Можно потратить на неё и 10 минут можно и час.

author: {'steamid': '76561198125701972', 'num_games_owned': 584, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 294, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 272, 'last_played': 1477395833}
review:
Я очень долго думал, купить ли мне эту игру. Через долгое время раздумий, я всё-таки решил воздержаться от покупки. И тут один пользователь решил устроить конкурс и у меня получилось выиграть его. А призом была вот эта игра. И знаете что? Я 100 раз пожалел, что не купил эту игру сразу! 
- Геймплей очень легко освоить.
- Сюжет довольно прикольный и интересный. Порой, запутанный, но так даже интереснее.
- Свобода действий. Перед вами небольшой город, где есть чем заняться. От различных заданий и квестов, до различных развлечений. А можно и просто побегать по городу и постреляться с полицейскими или выполнять сюжетные задания.
- Не обошлось без юмора. О да, юмор - это как раз то, чего не хватает многим играм.
- Графика? Ха-ха-ха. Кому нужна графика, когда игра и так великолепна? 
- Возможность изменять своего персонажа. Можно сменить ему причёску в парикмахерской. Набить тату в тату-салоне. Можно купить персонажу личный скейт.

Игра выполнена в стиле восьмибитной игры. Цена может вас смутить, но любители такого жанра точно не пожалеют, если приобретут эту замечательную игру. Ставлю этому произведению искусства 9/10..

author: {'steamid': '76561198127042875', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 501, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 383, 'last_played': 1402861562}

author: {'steamid': '76561197999971909', 'num_games_owned': 1472, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 1102, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1102, 'last_played': 1397474627}
review: Before buying this, make sure you are born before 1990 and you actually possessed a Nintendo Entertainment System: in this case, you will see this game as a funny 8 bit GTA with a ultra-nostalgic flavour, with a nice replayability and rockin' chiptune music. Else, this will be a quite boring and dull game with no significant meaning.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080952007', 'num_games_owned': 416, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 924, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 909, 'last_played': 1401240593}
review: Pick this up on a sale, it's pretty damn fun, the story is addicting.

author: {'steamid': '76561198098027635', 'num_games_owned': 153, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1402128688}
review: This game is the very definition of overkill. Can there be such a thing as too many references? YES. Every second of this game is filled with costant references to movies and other games and it becomes mind numbing really really fast. Most of them are just simply references that really are not funny moments in the first place. The game never lets up and just lets you play. It was the most painful 16 minutes of my life. I will never play this game again. If you want to try it, do not pay 10 bucks for it. I paid a buck and still somewhat feel that it should have been cheaper.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972433746', 'num_games_owned': 2123, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 497, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 497, 'last_played': 1401964556}
review:
Dieses Spiel, spielt sich eigentlich wie GTA 2 wer es noch kennt. Zumindest was die vielen Sachen angeht. 
Mit der Ausnahme das hier noch sehr viele andere Spiele durch den Kakao gezogen werden.

Also wer es lustig findet wenn die Ninja Turtles während einer Verfolgungsjagd aus dem Gulli gesprungen kommen oder man nach einer Zeitreise vom Doc und seinem Zeitreiseauto von "Zurück in die Zukunft" erwartet wird, der darf sich dieses Spiel nicht entgehen lassen.

Ansonsten gibt es hier auch noch viele Sachen zu entdecken und Freizuschalten so wie mehrere Minispiele.

Also für Abwechslung ist in dem Spiel gesorgt.

Wer auf so eine Grafik steht wie in diesem Spiel und dann noch ein GTA Fan ist dem würde ich zu diesem Spiel raten.

Hier ein Video dazu:

http://youtu.be/M-hBYMKsOTk

author: {'steamid': '76561198065709158', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1401956871}
review:
эта игра нечто между пародией и ностальгией. игра выполнена в стиле старинных 8-битных игр.
геймплей напоминает первую гта но так-же в этой игре можно найти все возможные пародии и отсылки к известным 8-битным играм (контра,первые черепашки ниндзя,утиная охота,мегамэн,назад в будущее,невероятные приключения билла и тедда и т.д.)
рекомендую тем кто когда-то в детстве играл на 8-битной нинтенде или же нашем русском дендике.
10/10
(это одна из лучших инди-игр)

author: {'steamid': '76561198057631069', 'num_games_owned': 124, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 250, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1402598796}
review: Огромное количество пасхалок из фильмов и игр 90х годов. Всем кто играл на Денди, понравится :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198032678194', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 618, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 618, 'last_played': 1401731654}
review: Und es ist doch ein GTA in 2D mit viel Nostalgie. Wer Filme und Spiele wie Ghostbusters, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Mario, Metal Gear Solid, Super Meat Boy, Bit Trip oder Zurück in die Zukunft kennt, wird mit diesem Spiel doppelt so viel Spaß haben. Es ist ein Open World Spiel, obwohl während den Missionen Fahrtwege bzw. Standortwechsel gerne übersprungen werden.  Das schadet zwar dem Open World Ansatz, verhindert aber gleichzeitig eine unnötige Verlängerung der Story. Andererseits gibt es genügend Zwischenspeicherpunkte, wobei der Schwierigkeitsgrad zum Ende des Spiels zunimmt.

author: {'steamid': '76561198033995360', 'num_games_owned': 2161, 'num_reviews': 441, 'playtime_forever': 528, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 482, 'last_played': 1690168311}
review:
Un jeu à ne pas mettre entre toutes les pattes. Ceux que le trailer n'a pas déjà fait fuir seront ravis de savoir que Retro City Rampage tient la plupart de ses promesses, humbles mais nombreuses. Plus qu'un simple GTA-like minimaliste qui pioche allègrement dans les copyrights des jeux 8 bits, des films des années 80 et du jeu vidéo indépendant d'aujourd'hui, c'est un immense petit foutoir à la prise en main immédiate. Le scénario justifie différentes phases d'action et de gameplay toutes arrachées au siècle dernier ; cette variété de situations empêche le joueur de se lasser voire de s'endormir durant la courte campagne (6 heures de jeu) consolidée par de nombreuses missions et mini-jeux annexes. Entre variété, esprit old school et bien sûr d'innombrables personnages et licences qui nous reviennent avec des noms et des allures déformés façon made in China, le public ciblé devrait revenir satisfait de l'aventure.

Du côté des déceptions, l'aspect parodique était l'occasion de faire rire, Retro City Rampage se contentera de faire sourire. L'humour n'est en effet pas vraiment intelligent ni même assez con pour être drôle, les messages qu'il distille au travers de caricatures grossières ne le sont pas non plus ; et pourtant difficile de ne pas s'enthousiasmer d'embarquer le Doc' avec soi dans sa DeLorean pour aller tabasser un estraz du docteur Robonik, le tout sur une musique MIDI entraînante. Une accumulation de références pas forcément subtiles ni bien exploitées mais qui, empilées les unes sur les autres, contribuent au charme du titre. Dans ses gameplays, ses graphismes, ses sons et même la bordure de l'écran qui mime une grosse cathodique comme on les aimait tant, Retro City Rampage est un mashup des saveurs de l'époque, un cupcake multicolore aux goûts de la NES, des VHS de la collection "200% action" avec Stallone ou Schwarzy et bien sûr du bol de Chocapic. Alors oui le jeu a le défaut d'être une parodie qui manque d'humour, accumule plutôt que maîtriser, appuie tellement sur l'aspect rétro qu'il pourrait passer pour rétrograde. Ses défauts mais surtout ses atouts limitent son public à un parterre de nostalgiques volontaires. Retro City Rampage est un peu comme une bulgare galleuse édentée à la pilosité trop développée : si vous avez envie d'en avoir envie, ça passera.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073034783', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1088, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1022, 'last_played': 1466551229}
review:
Honestly, one of the best retro-styled games I've played. This game gives you a lot of content if you compare it to most games nowadays that cost 10 bucks. You'll be hooked with this game and the amount of variety in it is impressive. More importantly, if you're here because you think it's just like GTA, this game most likely isn't for you. This game is for people who are fans of arcade and NES games, and people who are soft enough to wanna have a good laugh. Every mission is different in it's own way, and there's always a reference or parody that gets you to laugh. As you progress through the game, it obviously gets harder. This game isn't impossible, but it gets difficult, that's for sure. At first you just kill dudes with pistols, but then you're gonna run into dudes with bazookas. 

The story is obviously not supposed to make sense, I mean this game is a parody, just look at the title. Despite how senseless it may be, it surely is entertaining. It was fun for me to walk down the street and randomly run into some batman parody, and then having to impersonate him. At least the game actually had a story, and it's been a while since I've enjoyed one this hilarious.

I do recommend this game, and trust me, it is worth the 10 bucks.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992163256', 'num_games_owned': 2047, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 396, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 269, 'last_played': 1463447261}
review: It's like a well-designed (e.g. modern conveniences like just-in-time help/tutorial reminders) GTA2 chock full (this is an understatement) of video game related references. And I don't mean just your run-of-the-mill "remember old graphics and cheesy writing?" references, or even a few specific things like "princess is in another castle". I mean they poured their heart and soul into this thing. Less common references include the "history of IBM", "Commodore 64 load flags", "Game Genie noises", and tons of musical parodies that will be nostalgic of particular games/tunes without actually stealing the audio. This game screams "polish polish polish" and everyone who has been gaming for a while or likes/is intrigued by 2D open-world games should give it a try.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997934524', 'num_games_owned': 3410, 'num_reviews': 355, 'playtime_forever': 468, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 468, 'last_played': 1438544991}
review: Retro City Rampage is a great open world game that manages to have zero filler. Every mission is unique, which means you'll never get bored with it during the six or seven hours the storyline lasts. There are also some pretty fun challenge modes. The graphics are some of the best done "fake nes" graphics I've seen in an indie game, and the game is overall very pleasant to look at. You can't go wrong with this one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119250167', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 240, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 139, 'last_played': 1646965543}
review:
I'm only a teenager but i grew up playing the old text based games from the 80's. Like Leisure Suit Larry or King's Quest, i also enjoy old playstation 1 games. Retro City Rampage is a spoof of all the old good games rolled into a Grand Theft Auto 1 or 2 scenario. You'll see parody's of Paperboy, Leisure Suit Larry and from the front cover it's quite obvious, Back to the future.
I haven't finished the game yet put it's pretty good so far, the music is pretty cool too. a spoofy 8 bit GTA at it's best.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010177568', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 175, 'playtime_forever': 201, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1399677062}
review:
It's not bad, but it's worst offense is it's mundanity. I got bored, nothing more to it. It's not stupid bad, it just couldn't hold my attention. And those are the worst kind of games. The ones that are merely "okay" but not good enough to keep playing.

Don't believe people's lies, this game doesn't have any pop culture references. This game [b]is[/b] pop culture references. There isn't a single individual slice of this game which you can take out of context, show it to someone, and not have them say "Hey, I recognize that". The game is self aware if nothing else.

Two out of five Lennys
( ͡͡ ° ͜ʖ ͡ °) ( ͡͡ ° ͜ʖ ͡ °) ( ) ( ) ( )

author: {'steamid': '76561198004997463', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 41, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1399216697}
review:
un jeu qui ressemble plus à une parodie sous stéroïdes  des jeux 8 bits qu'ç un jeu, un vrais...

tellement plein de références et tout le temps à fond la caisse que ça en devient soulant. 
pas un temps mort, pas de personnalité propre. juste du détournement et le plus possible jusqu'à overdose.

le concept est sympa sur le papier, remplis de fan service, mais bon sang faut vraiment s'accrocher pour supporter tout ça à un rythme aussi effreiné...

author: {'steamid': '76561197962083981', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 488, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 488, 'last_played': 1401477533}
review:
It's hard no to recommended this game for so many reasons but here some:

1- it's made in Canada ( yeah most don't care.... but who cares ! Right ! )
2- it try and manage to bring back so many good moments from the past
3- and i guess some might like the humor some not, but it ain't serious at all!

Now that it's 10 $ it's a great deal, story wise it's about 7 hours long if you take a lil time, and there is some challenge and free roaming wich give to the replay value. Even though I didn't play much after the story i'm pretty sure it coul had at least 2 hours more.

Nostalgia is something great to help a game out so I don't know if I could say it's for everybody, as younger one might not understand all the references.

Was a great 8 hours, don't regret it

author: {'steamid': '76561197970363740', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 338, 'last_played': 1401438698}
review: Retro City Rampage vereint die geballte Videogame-Power der 90iger in einem durchgedrehten Spiel. Für die Leute die mit diesen Videospielen, wie Turtels, Supermario, Mega-Man und Metal Gear Solid aufgewachsen sind, werden mit diesem Spiel ihre wahre Freude haben. Das Spiel ist vom Schwierigkeitsgrad ziemlich herausfordernd, wie auch die orignalen Vorbilder... nur mit mehr Checkpoints :) Um das Nostalgische Feeling mal wieder zureaktivieren ist dieses Spiel für jeden etwas der nach 1985 geboren wurde. Für kleines Geld auf jedenfall lohneswert.

author: {'steamid': '76561197986496984', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 198, 'playtime_forever': 500, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 500, 'last_played': 1400697033}
review:
[i]„Nebát se ohlédnout.“[/i]

Jedná se o hru, která čerpá inspiraci z osmdesátých a devadesátých let. Hrajete za postavu jménem Player a vaším úkolem je získat součástky na opravu stroje času. Děj se odehrává ve městě Theftropolis, po kterém se můžete volně pohybovat. Máte také možnost si kdykoliv od ostatních obyvatel „vypůjčit“ jejich dopravní prostředek, pro rychlejší přesun na požadované místo. Musíte si ovšem dávat pozor na policii, která pro tento druh výpomoci nemá pochopení.

Hru lze označit jako parodii, určenou hlavně starším hráčům. Nebere se totiž vůbec vážně a neustále pomrkává po lidech, kteří pamatují hry z osmdesátých let. Těšit se tak můžete na několik postav z herní historie, ale také na filmové hrdiny té doby. Dočkáte se také retro grafiky a zvuků, které odpovídají danému období. Za zmínku stojí i skvělá hudba, která dotváří povedenou atmosféru.

Příběh je vyprávěn pomocí jednotlivých misí, které se spustí ve chvíli, kdy dorazíte na označené místo. Některé z nich se odehrávají přímo v ulicích města, jiné pak v interiérech. Ve většině z nich dojde na souboje a přestřelky, hra proto nabízí několik chladných i střelných zbraní. Player také ovládá jednu mocnou bojovou techniku – skákání. Nejen že dokáže přeskočit letící kulky, ale dokonce umí eliminovat protivníka skokem na hlavu.

Potěší také rozumné umístění záchytných bodů, takže když v průběhu mise selžete, nemusíte ji plnit znovu od začátku. Při opakovaném neúspěchu se navíc ukáže obrazovka s několika tipy, které vám mohou pomoci. Kromě příběhových misí, můžete také plnit vedlejší úkoly. Například závodit na čas nebo se pokusit o maximální destrukci svého okolí.

Pokud tedy máte náladu na herní parodii, ohlížející se do minulosti, pak máte mé doporučení. V opačném případě ale koupi dobře zvažte, tenhle stroj času totiž nemusí sednout každému.

[i][url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/6861342/]Další recenze na mé kurátorské stránce[/url][/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198002511225', 'num_games_owned': 983, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 254, 'last_played': 1415802111}
review:
Man nehme GTA aus Gameboy Color Zeiten und vermenge dies mit jeder Menge Parodie, FERTIG ist Retro City Rampage.
MIDI oder auch bekannt, 8-Bit Geräusche und Musik bringen Retrofeeling Pur. Die RADIO Sender sind vollgepackt mit Chiptune Musik und machen laune. Die Möglichkeiten sind recht groß ausgefallen, so könnt ihr Minispiele (wie Epic Meal Time) finden, euch ein Tattoo oder neuen Haarschnitt holen, natürlich könnt ihr auch die Cops anhängen indem ihr die Farbe eures Autos umlackieren lasst oder es mit Gadgets wie Pistolen ausstattet. Auch eure Arcade Maschine (der Rand eures im Spiel dargestellten 4:3 Monitor, natürlich auch Rahmenlos in 16:9 spielbar) könnt ihr wählen oder ihr wollt es in alten MS-DOS, Gameboy (1. Gen), VGA oder anderen damaligen Darstellungs Farben spielen, dann könnt ihr auch diese auf eure Wünsche anpassen. Man begegnet den A-Team, Rambo, Ninja Turtle und auch anderen parodierten Figuen (Darunter auch der verrückte Professor aus Back to the Future), was dem ganzen immer wieder ein grinsen ins Gesicht zaubert.
Ich kann es als Retrofan nur empfehlen und es mach immer wieder laune da man kleine Parodien und Easter Eggs findet.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989137262', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 750, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 750, 'last_played': 1400646992}

author: {'steamid': '76561197996377287', 'num_games_owned': 213, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 265, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1443391910}

author: {'steamid': '76561198003254327', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 554, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 554, 'last_played': 1400609582}
review:
Questo gioco è DIVERTENTE. Una parodia di GTA mai banale, chiari riferimenti ai film e ai videogiochi anni 80-90 (ritorno al futuro, Batman e Joker, Mario Bros, Robocop,ecc) ... in tutto con dei dialoghi simpatici e ironici insomma divertenti. Per chi ha scritto che i dialoghi sono banali e il gioco è una copia di GTA, mi sa che non hanno capito veramente il senso del gioco... 
Per me rimane un piccolo capolavoro dell'indie ,lo stile retro riuscito benissimo assieme alle musiche il tutto con l'ironia di ogni personaggio e missioni sempre nuove.... inoltre il livello di difficoltà è alto... ma sinceramente noi degli anni 90 siamo abituati alle sfide a differenza dei giochi moderni che sono abbastanza sempliciotti.
Lo consiglio vivamente per chi vuole immergersi nel passato e DIVERTIRSI DAVVERO!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198011544317', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 1394, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1096, 'last_played': 1571585565}
review: When it comes to GTA clones, this game has got to be the most outrageously hilarious one I've ever played, even moreso than with Saints Row The Third and that's really saying something from someone who has played a load of open-world sandbox types of games, but this one conveys the retro feel to a T. The story isn't exactly anything to write home about, but that's easily forgiven with how "mature" this game is. From potshots at gaming companies, cameos out the whazoo from game devs and gaming icons alike, lookalike and soundalike references from games of the past and mixed in with a lot of tongue-in-cheek wisecracks that are designed to get you to bust a gut out laughing, there is absolutely no reason as to why this title should not be in your collection.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105029957', 'num_games_owned': 227, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 438, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 338, 'last_played': 1428095483}
review:
Retro City Rampage is a very nice game: it isn't just an 8-bit version of GTA, but it is also a game that combines all the good things about gaming from the 80s.

The missions are very interesting, the arcade challenges are addictive and the storyline is impressive.

Overall it is worth all 9 euros (I got it on a 90% sale, but it might appear again)!

10/10 would play again

author: {'steamid': '76561198032202899', 'num_games_owned': 1420, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 201, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1399867928}
review:
Ne! Vážně nemám chuť tohle dohrávat... Největší kravina, co jsem na Steamu hrál. Uvodní obrázek vypadal parádně. Přece jen jako fandu BttF něco takového zaujme. A cena 0,75 eur? Proč ne.
Věděl jsem, že má jít o parodii. Netušil jsem, že má jít o parodii na herní průmysl. Tohle je opravdu výsměch programátorům, kteří dělají perfektní kousky a nakonec si je 75% lidí stáhne přes warez.
Pro všechny, co nad tímhle budou někdy uvažovat... vyvarujte se tomu.
PS: možná se ptáte, proč mám odehrány 3 hodiny... "Vývojářům" bylo jasné, že donutit lidi hrát takovou sra*ku můžou jen velkou spoustou kartiček...posbírání 8 kartiček mi trvalo 4 hodiny...

author: {'steamid': '76561197973993275', 'num_games_owned': 1931, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 350, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 350, 'last_played': 1399831820}
review:
Synopsis: A 8 bit NES era take on Grand Theft Auto.

Yea!The shooting is good, a varied amount of game play types from the NES era and the story and starting references will make you smirk and remember the old days of NES games

Meh! But the reference parodys quickly lose their novelty as your constantly bombarded with them. Controls are extremely akward and most of the time it is difficult to perform what you want to( from stomping on guys to driving).

Bleh! The difficulty ramps up towards the end making it vastly more frustrating then challenging. Being crammed into small coriders where you get pummeled by 1 hit kill rockets or thrown into rooms with out a weapon and guys having guns could result in many many level restarts. The final boss is also a frustrating expierience with the need for pixel perfect  percision(which the akward controls makes difficult) and timing.


The Lowdown: I really wanted to like this game but just couldn't, the controls are akward in almost all aspects and this is with trying a controller and keyboard. The game starts off great but quickly loses its flavor of fun. The references come out like they are being forced(should of cutdown on them and fleshed out some more of the more popular ones). The difficulty changes midway to a point where it becomes frustrating  when you after to do the same level forty times due to you missing a set of triple jumps by a few pixels to you being stuck in a 2 block hallway where 6 guys shoot bazookas at you killing you in 1 shot before you can get your own shot off. Its a joke and a waste of time that you could be playing other games that actually make difficulty fair.Beating a gmae should feel like an acomplishment, but this one i was just glad that I was able to remove it from the backlog and off the HDD. Only redeeming factor is a quick end at 5 hours.

Haters are gonna hate but i rate it 2/5. Only worth it through a very cheap sale

author: {'steamid': '76561198061214576', 'num_games_owned': 562, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 667, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 651, 'last_played': 1419292574}

author: {'steamid': '76561198042237959', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 241, 'playtime_forever': 914, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 914, 'last_played': 1399822079}
review:
I don't know why I forced myself through this torturous 15 hours of mediocrity. Controls are extremely awkward even playing on a PS2 controller, gameplay is dull. One thing it has though is varied gameplay - there are many missions that reference other games. Unfortunately that's where it also fails, the game is a massive parody, everything is a parody of a parody. After the first few "heh"s it becomes over used. Then it tries to have some original content and you get explosive sweat man. Suffice to say, I didn't "get it". I grew up in the 80s on Paper Boy, TMNT, Skate or Die, Battletoads, Sonic, Mario.. I get the references, but I don't get why anyone would think this is fun. 

Retro City Rampage is like someone on a diet who remembers how awesome fast food was, then rolled out some dough, topped it with chocolate sauce, covered it with fried chicken, ice-cream, hotdog buns, skittles and Big Mac sauce and expect you to eat it - but don't worry guys, if it tastes bad it's just a parody of a pizza. 

Can think of many better things to spend $1 on.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057970870', 'num_games_owned': 354, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 884, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 830, 'last_played': 1406236831}

author: {'steamid': '76561197960825172', 'num_games_owned': 1309, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 955, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 955, 'last_played': 1399803447}
review:
It took me a while to get used to the controls for driving but then this game got really fun.
It's a cocktail containing Grand Theft Auto / Mario / Teenage Munant Ninja Turtles / Cobra and other retro games. And they mix perfectly together.

The game offers a huge arsenal of vehicles, weapons, environments, challanges and missions to keep you occupied. I liked the game so much that I needed to 100% complete the game and it only took me 16 hours ;D

You can even change the screen settings to match all sorts of old game emulators and also features great soundtracks.

If you like old school games, pixels, gta and open world freedom get this game. It's more then worth the money.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080093695', 'num_games_owned': 539, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 817, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 710, 'last_played': 1409159972}
review:
Обезбашенная игра , заставшим приставки стоит попробовать однозначно!
Да и вообще я шел себе такой по улице никого не трогал и тут с под люка на меня 4 черепашки нинзя напали , я окуел. После я грабил банк с джокером по схеме как в фильме,верхом ездил на кинг-конге по городу.Где такое можно встретить?? Просто отрыв башни!!!
Мисси не легкие - заставят потрудиться. 
Немного не хватает русского , но не беда, в принципе все и так ясно.
Графика хоть и 8-бит , но глаз не режет даже наоборот - приятная по своему .
Музон отдельная тема , как послушаю сразу улыбон тянеться.
В общем позабавляться можно!! Брал ее меньше чем за 1$ , цену отбивает однозначно

author: {'steamid': '76561198009984270', 'num_games_owned': 365, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 661, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 584, 'last_played': 1616082707}
review: Un gioco interessante, pieno di missioni secondarie e cose da fare. Lo stile grafico ricorda moltissimo i vecchi giochi anni 80/91 ed è pieno di citazioni di film, videogiochi, serie TV, Canali Youtube e chi ne ha più ne metta. Una storia banale ma che fa sorridere, con la sua idiozia e il suo "Sense of Humor". Il Gameplay può essere inizialmente strano e la configurazione dei tasti parecchio scomoda, ma con un po' di pratica si riesce a gestire qualsiasi tipo di situazioni. La difficoltà è elevata in alcune situazioni e più moderata in altre, non cadendo mai nel "Dio ma è troppo facile sto gioco". Un titolo interessante, in fin dei conti, pieno di...tutto. Consigliato soprattutto ai nostalgici, ed anche ai neofiti che hanno voglia di provare un po' di tutto.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043192670', 'num_games_owned': 542, 'num_reviews': 323, 'playtime_forever': 558, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1423494718}
review: Like GTA 1 with swag.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040985268', 'num_games_owned': 329, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 246, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 246, 'last_played': 1399003072}
review:
Сложно судить игру однозначно. Есть как плюсы, так и ощутимые минусы. 

Первое что порадовало - так это динамика игры, все довольно шустро и быстро. Это и затягивает.
Так же радует, что полностью поддерживает геймпад, играть стало куда приятнее. 
Игра достаточно интуитивная, в основном все понятно и вопросов "что делать?" как правило не возникает.

Из минусов хотелось бы отметить, как нестранно - звук. Да, 8-бит, да, приятная музыка по началу, но на второй час игры хочется снять наушники. Звук от тарахтящих машин и звон в ушах - это ужас.

По итогу - за полную стоимость брать не советую, по скидке - коллекцию пополнить можно, пару вечерков скоротать можно.

author: {'steamid': '76561198095246204', 'num_games_owned': 865, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 518, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1488482094}

author: {'steamid': '76561198060319217', 'num_games_owned': 140, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 370, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 346, 'last_played': 1449789071}
review:
Игра отчасти напоминает первые GTA, но таковой не является, так как в GTA представлен (реальный) мир с реальными людьми и жизненные миссии. А в Retro City Rampage конечно не должно быть нечего реального. По сути, игра состоит из (американского) юмора и бесконечной стрельбы. Мне кажется, что она должна была быть первой частью Saints Row. В не также все пропитано, какой то наркоманией и безумием. 
Плюсы+ 

+Музыка♪
+Юмор(на любителя)
+Интересные пасхалки 
+Бешеные миссии
+(GTA)

Минусы-
-Быстро надоедает 
-Если проблема с английским все диалоги в игре в пустоту (а их не мало)

Делаю  вывод: просто убивалка времени.

Геймплей: 8,5
Графика (8 бит): 7,5 
Музыка: 9,0
Управление: 7,5
Реиграбельность: 6,0
Общая оценка: 7,5

author: {'steamid': '76561197998325710', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 146, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 146, 'last_played': 1398133764}
review: All the elements for a great game are there, but are entirely wasted. As good as 8-bit open world sounds, it all begins to feel pretty pointless very quickly. There's no real motivation to do the side missions and minigames other than high scores. Roaming around town quickly becomes a chore unless you have one of the better vehicles. I can't help but wonder why this wasn't just a linear, old-school beat-em-up, but as it stands now, the open-world element of the game is entirely superfluous.  I'd give this one a pass unless the premise really interests you.

review:
Do you like the old days of NES Games because your nostagia goggles are on too tight?
Do you get off on stealing cars and outrunning the cops, army, and bionicops GTA style?

If you answer yes to either one of these, this is definitly a game you should pick up.
Also, seek help from a doctor. Nostagia goggles cut off circulation to your head, and 
getting off to stealing cars just isn't healthy.

8/10, on the count that keyboard controls are a tad weird to work with initialy and for "Virtual Burn" giving me headaches.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090623076', 'num_games_owned': 201, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 467, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 467, 'last_played': 1527215441}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198087838357', 'num_games_owned': 504, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 397, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 272, 'last_played': 1471191835}
review:
On a là le droit à un jeu superbe . C'est pas juste un GTA-like pixelisé qu'on a fait pour faire genre c'est du style rétro, parce que TOUT, et je dis bien TOUT dans ce jeu possède des références à d'anciennes séries / Jeux vidéo des années 80/90, certains plus récent, et on vous en ballance plein la gueule de ses références dès le début. Et bien sur, cela ce voit dans le gameplay.

Utiliser des voitures, c'est mainstream ? Utilisez des chaussures super soniques pour aller vite comme Sonic ! Envie de planer ? (Non, au 1er dègre je parle) Enfilez le costume de Tanuki de Mario pour voler !

Bon, ceci dit, l'histoire est TRES courte (environ 2 à 3h), mais c'est pas pour autant que le jeu s'arrête là. 
Des défi (d'extermination avec une arme ou power-ups spécifique) et mini-jeu sous formes de bornes d'arcades (la plus part feront référence à d'autres jeux) seront de la partie, ainsi que certains secrets à trouver comme les mur invisibles ou les butins cachés, ce qui permet au jeu d'avoir une durée de vie plutôt longue (surtout si vous visez de le finir à fond)

Par contre note spéciale à l'orthographe du jeu qui est écrit par un enfant de 8ans illétré et qui contient souvent au moins une faute dans un dialogue, mais ceci dit le jeu vaut son prix (même si je l'ai acheté 0,90€, il vaut bien ses 9€)

Manette recommandé pour le jeu.

author: {'steamid': '76561197961167439', 'num_games_owned': 1579, 'num_reviews': 720, 'playtime_forever': 641, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 251, 'last_played': 1693522004}
review:
Retro City Rampage mixes a lot of old school ideas together for a nostalgic experience that is easy to enjoy, but best captured in small doses. I tried the campaign story for several hours, but I found being an errand boy started to get repetitiously boring. That's not to say I wasn't having fun, rather having fun in moderation.

The stuff I enjoyed the most were the side missions where I got to go off on wild rampages with various weapons, although after about 5-10 minutes, I found myself looking for something else to do.

It's definitely a fun way to escape from reality. Plus there's something about scoring points for running people over that never gets old.

author: {'steamid': '76561198133549384', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 790, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 790, 'last_played': 1398721658}
review:
Puede decirse que Retro City Rampage es un [i]easter egg[/i] en sí mismo: los primeros compases del juego son trepidantes y en tan sólo cinco minutos te habrás cruzado con el Equipo A, las Tortugas Ninja y Doc (de" Regreso al Futuro"); a partir de ahí el juego pierde algo de fuelle pero se mantiene ofreciendo cameos y referencias a iconos culturales (del cine y de los videojuegos) de los 80 y 90 durante todo su desarrollo: el Doctor Robotnik, Batman, Doogie (de "Un médico precoz"), Rambo, Megaman, Sonic, Mario, Final Fantasy... la lista es realmente interminable e incluso abrumadora.

Sin embargo el juego es algo repetitivo y en ocasiones te encontrarás conduciendo de un punto a otro para realizar una misión realmente corta. Aún así no llega a hacerse aburrido debido a su escasa duración (entre cinco y diez horas) y a la multitud de cameos y referencias que irás descubriendo.

Un juego especialmente recomendado para quienes vivieron tales décadas y quieren realizar un "viaje al pasado"; los más jóvenes se perderán entre tanto homenaje y no disfrutarán completamente de la esencia del juego.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049664361', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 147, 'playtime_forever': 415, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 414, 'last_played': 1402624104}
review: Jogo muito divertido, historia engraçada, viciante, arsenal de armas bem variado, grafico 8-bit nostalgico, varias paródias, jogo muito bom, recomendo a todos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198101802351', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 184, 'playtime_forever': 834, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 834, 'last_played': 1398672184}
review:
Восьмибитное безумие в городе-ностальгии.
Retro City Rampage - довольно редкий пример игры-пародии, в которой помимо очевидных отсылок к кинематографу и играм 90-ых есть свой собственный, оригинальный юмор. И юмор этот высокого качества.
Сама игра - то, как выглядела бы GTA на NES (более известная в России как Денди): открытый мир с кучей магазинов, побочных заданий, "пасхальных яиц" и секретов. Здесь можно ездить на кроссовере-орангутане, а можно купить крутой скейтборд в магазине, можно купить себе очки/шляпы/бионическую руку, а можно выпить молока и словить наркоманский приход. А какие здесь миссии - отобрать у местного миллиардера Брюса Биффа его усадьбу с подземным логовом, а затем примерить костюм городского супергероя Биффмана, помочь Доку починить его машину времени, побыть охотником за привидениями и поджаривать людей с помощью протонного бластера, даже придется драпать от девушки, которая залетела от главного героя. В общем - всего не перечислить, это лучше увидеть самим.
Сама игра захватывающая и интерес к ней не теряется на всем протяжении игры, в отличии от многих игр-пародий. Но есть одно "но", которое сильно испортило мне игру - финальная гонка и схватка с боссом. Я понимаю, что авторы хотели влепить напоследок побольше ностальгии, но гонка на пиксельной трассе с препятствиями, да еще c ужасным 3D-эффектом, из-за которого все двоится-троится и который нельзя выключить... Это, мягко говоря, перебор и насилие над глазами игроков, за что ставлю игре на балл ниже.
Вердикт: выросшим в 90-ых играть обязательно, если только вы не брезгуете пикселями в 2014 году. 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198094681377', 'num_games_owned': 206, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 174, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 174, 'last_played': 1396374038}
review:
Mal ganz schnell ein paar Worte zu Retro City Rampage:
Viele bezeichnen es als ein 8-bit GTA, was ich auch tun werde da es ein paar Parallelen zwischen den Spielen gibt.
8-bit trifft es schon gut: das Spiel sieht schlecht aus und führt Dank der Pixelgrafik dazu, dass man es nicht lange am Stück spielen kann (ich zumindest nicht). Es gibt viele nette Eastereggs wie zb. ein Super Mario Level.
Ich habe gehört, dass die Story ziemlich lang sein soll was ich jetzt nicht beurteilen kann da ich es nicht weiter spiele.
FAZIT:
Es ist ein ganz nettes Indiespiel welches man sich mal bei nem Deal näher anschauen kann.

author: {'steamid': '76561198098557354', 'num_games_owned': 373, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1718, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 808, 'last_played': 1584161950}
review: Recomendo este jogo para aqueles que gostam de ação, mais gostam de coisas mais simples! Jogo muito bom com bastante coisas para fazer, desde da customização do personagem (Player), até customização de carros! Jogo nostalgico que faz varias referencias à jogos antigos e atuais! E vale à pena comprar, pois o jogo é muito bom! O jogo se passa na década de 80 inspirado no filme "De Volta Pro Futuro" ào contrario onde você vai para o futuro e tem que voltar para o passado, onde você tem que conseguir as peças pro carro De'lorean, muito boa temática e sem falar que a história é muito legal, tem muitos Easter Eggs e jogando esse jogo você só não está jogando um GTA em 8-bits como está jogando um jogo único com muito humor!

author: {'steamid': '76561198070724242', 'num_games_owned': 349, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 1297, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 574, 'last_played': 1454683885}
review: Um dos melhores jogos da steam,é uma mistura de 8 bits,jogos do NES e Mega drive,Saints Row e GTA juntos,ao estilo dos GTAs em 2D (GTA 1 e 2) o jogo é cheio de referencias e parodias de coisas dos anos 80 a 90,as missões são muito bem planejadas,recomendo muito comprarem! O Grand Theft Tendo não foi cancelado! =)

author: {'steamid': '76561198055266285', 'num_games_owned': 116, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 483, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 473, 'last_played': 1456480022}
review:
Before i start my review , lett me point out this game plays way better with a gamepad or controller. It works fine with a keyboard but the game is more difficult and less enjoyable to me.

This game is a game full of suprises and yet so much cliché, where you go wtf and say "ahaha now i get the reference".
The game is kind of a parody of the old gta games, talking about gta 1-3, where you run around in an open world and do quests and sidequests (or fuck around and do what you want). When you start the game however you instantly notice this is a throwback to the past with references for movies, news and games from the 90's and early 2000's. The basic gameplay is you running, stomping and killing enemies and getting from point a to b. Unlike the old gta games you can get a highscore for killing and stealing stuff which makes free roaming more enjoyable, but the main part of the game are the quests. So far being 5 hours into the campaign i found it extremely enjoyable to find the references in these missions. The missions often contain new power-ups, minigames, new characters and items to keep the game interesting for longer playthoughs. Retro city rampage also has a good sence of humor and made me laugh several times. The animations are quite good as well altough they are pretty simple sprites. Something i have to mention, i like to play the game for around 30 min.-1 hour everytime i play. I think that the game might start to bore you after playing it for more than 2 hours in one playthrough.

Overall i love the stylized graphics and great music a lott, altough if the references can't interest you or if you are to young to get them the game loses some of it's potential. If you like getting highscores, have a good laugh and do quests where you get struk by references at every corner this game is something for you! If you would would like a game with some good mechanics, lotts of minigames and some hours of gameplay you might also like retro city rampage. This game does not have multiplayer for people looking to play with friends!


Overall i would give the game a 83/100 
Retro city rampage is surely worth the 9€ or regional equivalent. If you think this is to expensive or are doubting that you would like it, then i advise to wait for a sale

author: {'steamid': '76561198132059799', 'num_games_owned': 254, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 588, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 350, 'last_played': 1436142000}
review: I love dis game. There are so many reasons why you should play this game. To name a few, there are old-school references and many graphical settings. Any old-school enthusiast would love this game. Some references are parodies of things such as Doc Choc( Dr.Brown from BTTF). If you're looking for a cheap retro style GTA-like game, you've come to the right place.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032101124', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1398094072}

author: {'steamid': '76561198013706662', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 404, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 400, 'last_played': 1579821650}
review:
The game's too short and easy and the whole game after the 1st mission is just a bunch of random events revolving around copycat characters you couldn't care less about. 99% of the plot just rides the Back to the Future train and occasionally mocks soccermoms, the NES/80's references are all either used as a (weak) basis for story missions or appear in passing mention, like the devs were just ticking down a checklist of things to reference whilst they made this.

The BTTF shit in of itself is wasted anyway because nothing in the game world (if you bother exploring it before the 1st mission) actually changes even though you've supposedly time-travelled a number of years into the future/past(the game never makes it clear on which one it is which goes to show how little thought they put into it). Yup, they made the whole game a time-travel plot just to wax nostalgia over one freaking film that not everyone is going to have that sort of attachment to.

Most of the side-content such as the challenges and mini-games are a joke and take almost no effort to get gold on. Most of the weapons are identical other than how much damage they do and apart from the speed shoes, the power-ups all feel like an after-thought the developers force you to use in certain missions in an attempt to get you to care about their existence.

The graphics, whilst I get are supposed to match the look of a NES game, are lazy- most of the game world looks the exact same despite being so small, the actual character sprites are fuckin microscopic and have almost no detail so everyone's basically a pallete-swap of each-other with the only distinguishing features being hair/hat. I understand this was originally supposed to be a homebrew NES game (EDIT: proto of said NES game is playable in the DX version, it's cute to look at... for about 5 seconds), but they really shot themselves in the foot in the graphics department by trying to make it "authentic", especially when I can think of God-knows how many actual NES games with better graphics than this.

The soundtrack is HUGE and there's a decent amount of variety but you barely get to hear any of the good tracks in the actual game unless you fiddle about with the radio stations cos they all play in the story missions which only last around 4-5 minutes at most cos, as I said, this game is too easy. Otherwise get used to listening to the same 3-4 songs throughout the game that get annoying really fast.

For a game that took 7 years to make and kept me waiting for almost 2 years after I first heard about this game before it came out, I was pretty damn disappointed. Buy it when it's on sale and you have about 6 hours to kill, otherwise if you want a good NES/80's parody game, play Abobo's Big Adventure for free on Newgrounds and stay the hell way from this.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992099399', 'num_games_owned': 527, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 516, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 516, 'last_played': 1398521554}
review: Wow. This was a blast to play. This game is simultaneously a blast to play and a love letter to gaming culture from the NES forward. I'm truly shocked at how many references were coherently packed into by Brian Provinciano. This is a masterpiece of gaming and parody. YES. BUY IT! (Brian, you win all the things.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198026454771', 'num_games_owned': 1211, 'num_reviews': 156, 'playtime_forever': 255, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 255, 'last_played': 1398506438}
review:
Graficamente ben piazzato, con una cura maniacale per i dettagli ed una vasta gamma di filtri grafici che rimandano a console e PC di vecchia data.
Un comparto sonoro curato, con una immensa colonna sonora.
Il gioco è intriso di humor, a tratti sarcastico, tenuto in sù da mille riferimenti, videoludici e non.

È carino, ma fino a che punto?
La storia è molto superficiale. I copiosi dialoghi, sebbene divertenti, non sono l'ideale per un gioco d'azione.
Missioni tecnicamente ripetitive e poco stimolanti.

L'aspetto, indubbiamente, peggiore del gioco è il caotico gameplay. 
Tutto succede troppo in fretta. Non si ha il tempo di scoprire una nuova feature del gioco che ne spunta un'altra.
I negozi sono sparsi nella monotona e piccola città in maniera impercettibile, a tal punto che non ho mai sentito la necessità di cambiare più di due volte acconciatura.
Gli eventi si susseguono così velocemente e così incoerentemente che si fa fatica a ricordarli.
Altri elementi, come inopportuni cuori sparsi per la città, negozi che vendono armi facilmente ottenibili dai nemici e la completa inutilità di avere un fondo cassa (visto che non c'è nulla di allettante da comprare nei negozi), mi inducono a pensare che, parte degli elementi del gioco, siano stati forzati.

La mia opinione, riguardo questo titolo, è sospesa.
Da una parte, sento che, dietro "Retro City Rampage", c'è tanto lavoro e tanta passione da parte degli sviluppatori; dall'altra, considero il titolo ancora troppo immaturo da molti punti di vista.

Ad ogni modo, Se non fosse stato per i riferimenti alla cultura nerd, questo titolo non avrebbe riscosso tanto successo.
Lo sconsiglio a tutti, tranne agli amanti dei riferimenti nerd.

review: I first bought and completed this game on the PS Vita, so when it came on offer (for the TUBULAR price of £0.69) I couldn't help but get it again. With solid gameplay mechanics, more references than you can shake a Flax Combobulator at, secrets, collectables, story, and a playtime that'll keep you intrigued, this is an investment you'll be glad you made. Oh, and the Nintendo style difficulty is frustrating at times but well placed.

review: I would wholeheartedly reccomend this game to anyone, it's mix of awesomeness and more awesome makes an epic result of awesome! Seriously though, this game is full of content, be it references, things to do, missions and exploding cops, this game  is for anyone (over twelve of course, be legal now) who likes anything I mentioned before. Even for someone who would prefer shiny graphics over the retro style of this game, it would still be a worthwhile buy. I'm pretty sure anyone playing this will at least understand one reference, be it to another game, tv series or anything else. In short, this game is basically a retro style, 2D GTAish game with a ton of references and definitely a good idea to buy for the £6.99 pricetag, if you think that is a bit steep, then wait for a sale, or maybe (if you are into trading) buy it from someone else via the steam trade system. 10/10 :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198079367042', 'num_games_owned': 913, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 282, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 281, 'last_played': 1551324211}
review:
After playing a while longer and playing around with a few things, I've decided my original review was unfair, and have decided to revise it. 
 
-First of all, collectively throughout the other platforms, I have invested hundreds of hours in this game, probably nearing a thousand.  That speaks volumes.
-Second of all, while I still stand by my opinion that the controls are awkward, it they can be bypassed using a control.
-Third, after playing around for a while, I did eventually get the mods to work.  While the community still appears split on whether it works or not, I'm going to review it for what I have.

Now, instead of writing a long, frivilous review, I'm just going to post the scores.

Replay Value: 9.5/10
Sexy Retro Soundtrack: 8/10
Sexy Retro Graphics: 8/10
Story: 8/10

Final Score- 8.375/10
Recommended Buy Price: Full

Final Thoughts:  Though this port does have its flaws, can the same not be said about most, if not every other port?  I'm content with this game being on Steam, and I will play it again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034263992', 'num_games_owned': 1672, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 758, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 406, 'last_played': 1426871226}
review:
Retro City Rampage es el juego más paródico que he visto en mucho tiempo. Si has bebido de los primeros Grand Theft Auto, Zelda, Super Mario, etc. Si has visto la serie de los 90 de las Tortugas Ninja. Si te encanta Regreso al Futuro. Si el rollo retro es lo tuyo. Si hacer el loco en un juego de vista isométrica. ¡Este es tu juego!
La verdad es que tira muchas veces de nostalgia... ¡pero si hasta puedes cambiar la pantalla para que simule una Game Boy! Y no se lo puedo reprochar, si ya de por sí el título del juego te avisa.
Un gran juego indie que merece la pena.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037697418', 'num_games_owned': 1321, 'num_reviews': 139, 'playtime_forever': 224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 224, 'last_played': 1398267700}
review: Retro City Rampage - это эдакая пародия (и очень убогая я бы сказал) на первые две части GTA, только с закосом под восьмибитные игры на игровых автоматах. Я сразу скажу, что первые две GTA для меня являются что ли своеобразным идолом и прорывом в игроиндустрии, я их до сих пор считаю одними из самых легендарных игр на пека (и вообще это были одни из первых игр детства). Только вот индустрия игр развивается, а разработчики решили уйти на несколько шагов назад и создать полный трэшак, при этом геймплейно напоминающий GTA 2. Но если в ней было хоть какое то подобие реализма (хоть чуть чуть), то здесь с первых секунд на экране творится полный пиздэц. Например танк в гта был подарком с небес, который получить было сложно, здесь же танк дают чуть ли ни как обычную машинку в первой же миссии, причём управлять им абсолютно не кашерно. А еще здесь можно использовать укрытия за восьмибитными стенками (FUCK MY MIND!) Наверное дальше уже и объяснять не стоит почему эта игра ужасна. Кароче если вы не заядлый инди дрочер, а обычный (левый) парень, который повелся на скидку 90%, то проходите мимо, сие творение не для нас.

author: {'steamid': '76561198106244605', 'num_games_owned': 52, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 277, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 134, 'last_played': 1430732774}

author: {'steamid': '76561198100388140', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 843, 'playtime_forever': 751, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 722, 'last_played': 1466695932}
review: Отличная игра для скучающих по играм на восьмибитных приставках, по фильмам и мультфильмам детства (Например, Охотники за приведениями, Бэтмэн, Робокоп, Назад в Будущее, Черепашки ниндзя и т.д.). Можете пройти кампанию из самых необычных миссий, что вы когда либо видели (Можно поиграть за Смерть, а потом угнать мусоровоз и грузить в него спящих бандитов!") или забить на всё и заняться беспределом на улицах - купить костюм робокопа и взять "взаймы" у военных танк...

author: {'steamid': '76561198040820711', 'num_games_owned': 985, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 319, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 245, 'last_played': 1402328091}
review: This has to be one of my favorite games, at this point. This is literally old-school Grand Theft Auto if it were on the NES and as full of pop culture references as it could get, and it just works. Honestly, this game has been incredible amounts of fun so far, and I recommend it to anyone who just loves a game full of comedy and fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198121374348', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 476, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 393, 'last_played': 1416507644}
review:
I played almost every retro styled game and I got to say that this may be the BEST retro game of all time.

The game itself is a GTA 1/2 clone, built in a 8-bit style with many oldschool references, including Back to the Future, Frogger, They See me Rollin' etc. There are three modes: Storyline, Arcade and Freeroam. Freeroam is basically Story Mode without the Story. Arcade mode is awesome, includes so many awesome different mini games. The Story itself is amazing and filled with so many references and stuff that just blows my mind.

Play this game. You will not regret it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014890588', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 456, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 430, 'last_played': 1398257467}
review:
It’s like Grand Theft Auto in an 8-bit simulator. Retro City Rampage is the incarnation of the 80s and 90s. Also the sound effects and music make you totally feel the 80s. This game is a MUST-HAVE for all those who grew up with such games and want to relive the old times. Through, if you’re one of the new age-kids where graphics are everything, you might want to pass.

Once you made it through the handful of training missions, the game opens up substantially, and you can keep both: the comedy and the action rolling at your own pace. Some of the comic moments are so thick that it can at first feel oppressive. Nobody will laugh at everything, BUT everybody will laugh at SOMETHING in this game!

Of course you can keep attention to all missions but the most of your fun will consist of freeroaming the city and just raising hell! It’s easy to spend hours with it because the game always offers enough to keep you busy. For example whenever you start to kill people (with driving, shooting, punching or otherwise) the police will follow you and you get the feeling of a gangster on escape.

I highly recommend this game. ♥

review: This game is great. It's like classic gta inside an NES city, Theftropolis. It has plenty of NES/80's pop culture references which I enjoyed a lot, along with other classic game references and even some modern game references as well. I got the game on a great deal for $0.99 but I say it's worth it for $10. If you are a fan of old school gaming you should check Retro City Rampage out for sure.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991234802', 'num_games_owned': 947, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 1467, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1372, 'last_played': 1420202627}
review: Wow, what an awesome tribute to the 80's (and early 90's) this game is. It's basically GTA, NES style. The controls are well done, and causing havoc around the city is fun, but the crazy references to everything awesome about the late 80's, the 90's, and beyond are amazing. The plot makes no sense, but that's OK since you get to ride Donkey Kong, hijack the TMNT van, join the Ghost Busters, guest star in Saved by the Bell, and drive the Delorean from Back to the Future, among other stuff. If that sounds awesome, you should try it. It is awesome.

author: {'steamid': '76561198075222937', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1398747980}
review:
bastante entretenido, con variedad de misiones, un estilo retro de los videojuegos muy bueno y desde los primeros minutos sientes la nostalgia de muchas cosas como videojuegos, series, caricaturas, personajes. muchos homenajes desde el inicio del juego. los controles son algo raros al principio, se puede usar el mando de xbox 360 pero senti que respondia con un cierto retraso, es mejor usar el tecleado. la historia es ridicula pero divertida, si estas buscando una historia profunda o bien hecha mejor busca por otro lado, la historia es divertida pero ridicula como ya mencione. y tiene sus cosas como logros y cromos de steam. tiene un estilo retro de grand theft auto. 

7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198045241106', 'num_games_owned': 803, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 130, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1398477207}
review:
Nowadays, modern video games always include classic video game references, such as Mario, Sonic and Zelda, in order to make them more old school and nostalgia to it. But RCR isn't only that but it's also a game that WAS meant for old school fans of video games. It was originally meant to be a remake of GTA III under the title Grand Theftendo but was later changed into a original game in 2007 with the title being changed to Retro City Rampage.

Story focuses on a guy simply named player who was working on a bank heist with the Jester until he time travels to the year 20XX where a young scientist names Doc Choc finds him and helps him get back to his year, 1985, by finding pieces of the time machine which breaks down when you travel

Gameplay does have a GTA feel to it in 8-Bit but also throws in many video game references within the first 4-5 minutes of the game. Theirs also references to classic shows and movies from the 80's. You can also do side jobs in order to make lots of money. And you can even play as famous characters from indie games such as, Super Meat Boy, Steve from Minecraft and Commander Video from the Bit.Trip series.

I say get this game if your a hugh fan of classic games or if you love the GTA series as well. You will be hooked in.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965376405', 'num_games_owned': 748, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 439, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 438, 'last_played': 1415738370}
review: Dude, I was scouring my local Computer City for some hot new video games for my Nintendo Entertainment System when my eyes suddenly glued to this one. Retro City Rampage! The box alone was super cool! It was Steaming with awesome, and I could just imagine what it was going to be like to take the game home and play it for myself. I was blown away when I first inserted the cartridge. Not since Adventure on the Atari 2600 have I seen a video game with an open world like this. There is so much to do. I can take part-time jobs, run over people with cars, change my appearance at hair salons and tatoo parlors, run over people with cars, play snazzy arcade games, and even run over people with cars! Super Mario Bros. has nothing on this beast! There are plenty of references to other NES games laid about the game world, by the way! Actually, it is an NES lover's dream, with references to Contra, Duck Hunt, Jackal, Paperboy, Skate or Die! and many others! Mere words will never be able to do this game justice, though, so be sure to check out Retro City Rampage for yourself. Just remember not to blow too hard on the cartridge. You might pass out!

author: {'steamid': '76561198066825475', 'num_games_owned': 410, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1407617592}
review: Um jogo tão simples e ao mesmo tempo tão divertido, Retro City Rampage lembra muito os primeiros GTA'S, com uma mistura de Mario, as sensações de jogar é a de Nostalgia e convulsão ( de tantas cores e luzes ), e incrivelmente me fez voltar a ser um "crianção". Esse jogo exala anos 80 e sim faz muitas, mas muitas referencias a jogos clássicos e coisas da época, MUITAS mesmo, como por exemplo: Thundercats,  Skate Or Die, Fresh Prince ( Minha referencia favorita! ), Tenacious D, Chief O'Hara ( Batman dos anos 60 ),  Megaman II, Duck Hunt bird and dog, Bomberman, Mortal Kombat II. E isso é so oque eu consegui encontrar, porque provavelmente tem muitos mais... emfim o jogo está na promoção e 2,00 R$ é pouco por ele mas 16,00 R$, então aproveite a chance e compre quanto antes, você nao vai se arrepender.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074305171', 'num_games_owned': 724, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 984, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 462, 'last_played': 1401371424}
review:
Сейчас огромная скидка,а это значит пора написать  обзор на одну из моих любимых игр в стиме.
Как-то раз сидя на уроке литературы друг играл в эту игру на  пс вите,по-началу я думал,что это гта 2 и не придавал значения,слушая дальше учителя,но вдруг друг резко вскочил и со счастливым лицом начал хлопать меня по плечу и говорить:"Смотри черепашки нинздя из канализации вылезли".После этого я начал поглядывать на игру  и мне она понравилась даже в роли зрителя.Придя домой я посмотрел,есть ли такая игра на пк,к моей огромной радости она была и в добавок ко всему в стиме.Не задумываясь я ее купил и незамедлительно скачал и запустил.К моему сожалению русского языка не было,но для чего спрашивается нам нужен гугл?)
И так играть нам придется за бандита,выполняющего основные миссии и уровни-испытания.
В основных миссиях  мы встретим множество знакомых персонажей из 80,90-ых годов.
8-битная графика и вид сверху делают свое дело,играть очень интересно,а из-за свободного мира и относительно большого города игра не наскучит.
В игре большой выбор оружия,начиная от гитары и заканчивая плазменным оружием.Так же есть апгрейд оружия.
Как я уже говорил игра напоминает гта 2,а это значит,что можно угонять автомобили(выбор весьма велик) и делать перестрелки с полицией.
Насчет уровней-испытаний-поберегите нервы,конечно не мит бой,но попотеть придется.
Итак мы имеем идеальную 8-битную игру,в которой есть все,начиная от ностальгии и заканчивая сюжетом,поэтому не поленитесь и купите,24 рубля-гроши для такой прекрасной игры.
10\10

author: {'steamid': '76561198003395849', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 399, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1439298490}

There are also tons and tons and tons of referençes to videogames and comic books movies  etç

for 0,89cents Hell Yeah Pick it now as it is cheap belive me you wont find a game better than this one for this price

author: {'steamid': '76561198053661788', 'num_games_owned': 579, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 128, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1696872874}
review:
Ouah! Ce jeu est absolument fantastique! Les jeunes joueurs ne seront peut-etre pas aussi touchés par ce jeu! Ils a de nombreux + qui ne sont pas négligables!

Les + => - L'humour omniprésent
          => -C'est un open world!!
          => -Les musiques! (plus de 2 heures de différents soundtracks
          => -Les clins d'oeil aux films,jeux et autres séries télés!
          => -Les 6O missions principales et les 4O défis supplémentaires font durer le plaisir 
          => -Et plus encore!

Les - (et oui il y en a D: ) => Des fois les clins d'oeil deviennent vraiment lourd, au moins un par 15 secondes! Et la traduction française bourrée de fautes D:

Globalement, C'est le meilleur jeu 8-bit que j'ai jamais joué. Je le recommande pour tout le monde, Il a un prix franchement sous estimé [u]8,99[/u] et comme je l'ai acheté durant la solde du jour je l'ai eu pour 89 centimes! Alors dêpechez-vous!!!
